Content:: 1941 (MCMXLI) was a common year starting on Wednesday of the Gregorian calendar, the 1941st year of the Common Era (CE) and Anno Domini (AD) designations, the 941st year of the 2nd millennium, the 41st year of the 20th century, and the 2nd year of the 1940s decade. 1941 marked the entrance of the Soviet Union and the United States into World War II for the Allies. It also saw Nazi Germany begin implementing the Final Solution. Below, the events of World War II have the "WWII" prefix.
Title: 1941 - Wikipedia
